stripped_text: If Explode-a-palooza is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it. When the Runner accesses Explode-a-palooza, you may gain 5 credits.
text:
If Explode-a-palooza is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses Explode-a-palooza, you may gain 5[credit].
title: Explode-a-palooza
